You tried to look around but outside the clear stuff keeping you in a confined space you saw darkness. Not even the light above your head could shine light beyond an arm's length from the clear stuff. You looked down and saw your body. You had been forced to forget what clothes were by your handlers. You saw that the clear stuff showed a copy of you in it. However, it took you a second and at first you thought it was someone there to help, until she ran towards you like you ran towards her. That is when it happened, the lights went dim, and in the darkness you fell asleep.

You were awoken by your box moving. The world outside the clear stuff was buzzing with life. You beat on the glass but no one reacted. The box was then lifted up and carried across the room. You lost your balance and stumbled falling to your knees. One of the workers seemed angry at that and yelled in a box. A second later the box was set down in front of a door and slowly the box started tipping. You slid to the now lower side and eventually stood on that side that used to be a wall of the clear stuff. The box was slid toward the door and you heard a group of bangs at the side that was formerly the floor, and see little metal things holding the walls. The floor door opened, streaming in strange smells, sounds, and bright lights. You jumped back to the side that used to be the roof. The workers waited patiently for you to move.

Your eyes adjusted and you saw an expansive with lots of other beings that looked like you but with differences, some had other shades of skin, hair, some had weird stick things where their crack between the legs should be, and you began feeling more comfortable with the situation. You edge closer to the opening and peer outside. You begin taking it all in but the workers begin getting impatient with you. One knocks on the roof wall knowing it would scare you out of the box. Before you could jump back in the safe box the door closed. After a couple minutes you eventually begin playing with the other slaves.

Fate would have it that on your first day in the market that your new owner would walk by. He was a strong man of the superior Falothi race. He saw you playing joyfully and came down to study you. When the gate opened and the workers with your future master walked in you ran up and began trying to play with him. He laughed and said something in his strange language and they guided you onto the elevator. It arose and you with the group walked to the store front. He bought you as you studied your new friend. They strapped a leather thing around your neck and clipped another leather thing to it. Your new master held the other end and guided you out. You began running back and forth checking out everything. It was amazing, until the leash ran out. He tugged at it softly and you obeyed by walking with him. He brought you home to meet his family. Just like him they were all of this strange Alien race that was.
125121.title: Male

1251211.content: Were they the humans and you are the anthropoid?
1251211.title: humanoid

info.brief_description: Set in any time period, slaves are offered for sale to owners.
info.description: You awaken to find yourself in a cage, apparently in some type of retail agency. You realize you are for sale as a stream of free women and men pass by you. Some wander past without a glance, others read your profile, some even reach in to explore parts to your body which is kept in reach. You can overhear overhear customers asking the sales representatives about warranties, refund policies and sale prices. Your emotions are really tested when a sales consultant takes you out for a personal viewing. You experience lots of violations then. In this story, please feel free to proceed in any direction at will. Just like any purchased product, there are no limitations on what the owner(s) can do.
